newsitem.title: USA: Wave Tech sees strong revenue growth.
newsitem.headline: Wave Tech sees strong revenue growth.

text.p: Wave Technologies International Inc said Wednesday it expects strong revenue growth in all business segments throughout the remainder of fiscal 1997.
Earlier, the company posted July 31 first-quarter earnings of $0.06 per share on revenues of $6.7 million, compared to a year-earlier loss of $0.13 per share on revenues of $5.9 million.
President Kenneth Kousky said the company will benefit from a fall schedule with the addition of evening and weekend classes throughout its U.S. training centers.
